import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialog } from '@angular/material/dialog'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Item } from 'src/app/models/Item'; import { ItemService } from 'src/app/services/item/item.service'; import { TodoItemComponent } from './todo-item/todo-item.component'; import { map, take, switchMap } from 'rxjs/operators'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo-list', templateUrl: './todo-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo-list.component.css'], }) export class TodoListComponent implements OnInit { itens$: Observable = new Observable(); displayedColumns: string[] = [ 'id', 'description', 'dueDate', 'priority', 'dtaCreatedAt', 'dtaUpdatedAt', 'actions', ]; constructor(private service: ItemService, public dialog: MatDialog) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.itens$ = this.service.getAll(); } openModal(id?: number) { let dialogRef = this.dialog.open(TodoItemComponent, { height: '400px', width: '600px', data: { id }, }); dialogRef.afterClosed().subscribe((item) => { this.itens$ = this.itens$.pipe( map((itens) => { itens = itens; return itens; }) ); }); } }
